name: Jack Wreck
description: Jack Wreck is a potent sativa strain that combines two timeless classics, Jack Herer and Trainwreck. While Trainwreck’s influence is evident in Jack Wreck’s sweet citrus aroma, don’t expect the mellow, dreamy buzz associated with Jack Herer: Trainwreck genetics give Jack Wreck an intense kick of cerebral psychoactivity. The racy jolt of energy provided by this sativa hybrid may be too intense for some consumers, but those needing high THC levels can trust Jack Wreck for potent daytime enjoyment.
descriptionPlain: Jack Wreck is a potent sativa strain that combines two timeless classics, Jack Herer and Trainwreck. While Trainwreck’s influence is evident in Jack Wreck’s sweet citrus aroma, don’t expect the mellow, dreamy buzz associated with Jack Herer: Trainwreck genetics give Jack Wreck an intense kick of cerebral psychoactivity. The racy jolt of energy provided by this sativa hybrid may be too intense for some consumers, but those needing high THC levels can trust Jack Wreck for potent daytime enjoyment.

highlightedReviews.text:
this is a cross of jack herer and trainwreck, according to my dealer. i am having trouble wrapping my head around the idea that a weed of this potency exists in the world. really strong mental and body high -- the mental is very giddy and calm, i had a very intense two days with a lot of fucked up dental work and right now that could not be further from my mind. i suffer from an anxiety disorder so this abated that completely! the body high seems to be pretty intense, which i like - sort of a weight/pressure on your chest that to me is very calming almost? my legs are tingling, also. 

i'm not sure how common this strain is (i had never heard of it) but if you come across it, pick it up. this weed kicks my ass.
Definitely a sativa with its mental boost.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Pineapple Chunk, Jedi Kush, Red Cherry Berry, Jack Wreck, and Royal Kush
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
This week’s new strains are elite varieties developed by esteemed breeders in the cannabis community. From Barney’s Farm comes the sweet-tasting hybrids Pineapple Chunk and Red Cherry Berry. Cali Connection blesses us with Jedi Kush, bred from the indica alliance of Deathstar and SFV OG. Using the legendary genetics of Afghani and Skunk #1, G13 Labs created the balanced and medicinal Royal Kush. Last of all, for our sativa fans, we’ve added Jack Wreck which amps up the intensity of its Jack Herer parent.
Let us know what you think of these newcomers in a strain review!
   1. Pineapple Chunk
Characteristics of Pineapple Chunk:

Indica-leaning hybrid
Cheese and Skunk #1 crossed with Barney’s Pineapple
Breeder: Barney’s Farm
Tangy skunk, earthy cheese, and sweet pineapple aroma
Heavy full-body effects and a fast-paced head buzz
Painkilling and stress-relieving properties
Indoor flowering time of 55 days

   2. Jedi Kush
Characteristics of Jedi Kush:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Deathstar and SFV OG
Breeder: Cali Connection
Sour skunk and tangy diesel aroma
Dreamy, euphoric, and cerebrally energizing
Good for pain, PTSD, depression, stress, headaches, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   3. Red Cherry Berry
Characteristics of Red Cherry Berry:

50/50 hybrid
Cross between Skunk #1 and Cherry Bomb Indica
Breeder: Barney’s Farm
Flowery, fruity aroma
Balanced head and body effects
Good for pain, sleeplessness, and stress
Indoor flowering time of 60 to 70 days

   4. Jack Wreck
Characteristics of Jack Wreck:

70% sativa
Cross between Jack Herer and Trainwreck
Sweet citrus aroma
Intense kick of cerebral psychoactivity
Good for daytime relief of pain, appetite loss, and inflammation

   5. Royal Kush
Characteristics of Royal Kush:

50/50 hybrid
Cross between Afghani and Skunk #1
Breeder: G13 Labs
Earthy, skunky aroma
Happy, euphoric, relaxing effects
Good for stress, pain, and nausea
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 13 weeks
